metadata.title: What Is the Required Distance Between Electrodes?

sections.content:
Question:
What is the required distance between electrodes?
Answer:
Refer to "2.6.2 Relationship of panel thickness and crosstalk" in "Capacitive Sensor Microcontrollers CTSU Capacitive Touch Electrode Design Guide (R30AN0389)".
Suitable Products
RX113
RX130
RX231, RX230
